title: Smart speaker technology harnessed for hospital medical treatments

title_detail.value: Smart speaker technology harnessed for hospital medical treatments

summary: Smart speakers that are customarily used in your living room can be programmed to act as an aid to physicians in hospital operating rooms, according to new research.
